attributes.description: Please find your route at mbta.com/bus-schedule-changes and check the June 23 schedule for specific changes. You can also ask your bus driver for a printed summer schedule.
attributes.header: Beginning Sunday, June 23, the Route 43 summer bus schedule will take effect with Saturday and Sunday schedule changes throughout the day.
attributes.short_header: Beginning Sunday, June 23, the Route 43 summer bus schedule will take effect with Saturday and Sunday schedule changes throughout the day.
